remarks: Associative law for the multiplication operation of a ring. (Contributed by Steve Rodriguez, 9-Sep-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 21-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
ringi.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` R ) $.
ringi.2 $e |- H = ( 2nd ` R ) $.
ringi.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
rngoass $p |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X /\ C e. X ) ) -> ( ( A H B ) H C ) = ( A H ( B H C ) ) ) $.
